Event Handling¶

CommonEvent¶

class CommonEvent¶

Bases: object

A custom event, for use with the Event Handler.

property event_name¶

The name of this event.

CommonEventHandler¶

class CommonEventHandler(mod_name: str, event_function: Callable[[...], Any])¶

Bases: object

A handler of events.

can_handle_event(event) → bool¶

Determine if this event handler can handle the type of the event.

property event_function¶

The action to take upon receiving an event.

property event_type¶

The class type of events this Event Handler will handle.

handle_event(event) → bool¶

Handle the event data.

property mod_name¶

The name of the mod this event handler was created for.

CommonEventRegistry¶

class CommonEventRegistry¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.services.common_service.CommonService

Register event handlers and dispatch events.

dispatch(event: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent) → bool¶

Dispatch an event to any event handlers listening for it.

static handle_events(mod_name: str)¶

Decorate functions with this static method to register that function to handle an event.

Warning:

Event functions MUST be decorated with staticmethod and must only have a single argument with the name ‘event_data’ (Errors will be thrown upon loading the game otherwise)

Parameters

mod_name – The name of the mod the class is being registered for.
